titleStmt.title: Irwin Z. Smith to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1986

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

creation.placeName: St. Louis, St. Louis County, Missouri

body.p:
Samuel Knox.
Irwin Z. Smith
KNOX & SMITH,
ATTORNEYS AT LAW,
OFFICE, DARBY'S BUILDING, S. W. COR. FIFTH AND OLIVE STREETS.
Saint Louis, Nov. 30th 1864
To His Excellency
The Governor of the State of Kentucky,

I am acquainted with Joseph Lathrop Esq, who desires the appointment of Commissioner of deeds of the state of Kentucky for Missouri. I can endorse his loyalty, and his qualifications for the appointment he seeks.
I fully endorse and concur in the above statement and cheerfully recommend Mr Lathrop for the appointment asked
